author: Jakub Zavrel
title: An Empirical Re-Examination of Weighted Voting for k-NN
window: 40 50 60 70 80 90 100 % correct k letter "letter.majority" "letter.inverse" "letter.dudani" "letter.shepard" Figure 1: Accuracy results from experiments on the sonar, isolet PP-attach, and letter datasets as a function of k. this count. Although Shepard's function performed well on the PP-attachment dataset, it is much less robust on the UCI datasets, and only slightly outperforms majority voting.
